title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Biology, Physics, General Science/Mathematics.

title: FINE & APPLIED ART (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Fine Arts and any other two (2) subjects from:

1. Craft

2. Textile Clothing

3. Technical Drawing

4. A Science subject

5. An Arts subject

6. Decorative Painting

7. Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design

8. Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing

9. Graphic Design

10. Graphic Printing

11. Ceramics

12. Basic Electricity.

13. General Wood work

14. General Metal Work

15. Men/Ladies Garment Construction & Finishing

16. Spinning 16. Weaving

17. Men/Ladies Textile Design

18.SurfaceDesign & Printing

19.  Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing.

20. Spraying, Painting, Lining, Sign and Design
subjects: Fine Arts and any other two (2) subjects

title: HOME ECONOMICS (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the followings:

1.  Agricultural Science

2.  Biology

3.  Chemistry

4.  General Science

5.  Health Science

6.  Home Management/

7.  Hotel and Catering

8.  Food and Nutrition

9.  Integrated Science

10. Physical and Health Education/Physical Education

11. Physics

12. Economics

13. General Metal Work

14. Building/Engineering Drawing

15. Men/Ladies Garment    

     Construction and Finishing

16. Men/Ladies Textile   Design

17. Spinning 

18. Weaving

19. Surface Design and

     Printing

20. Bleaching, Dyeing and

     Finishing

21. Basic Electricity

 

GROUP A:

Home Economics, Home Management, Cookery, Needle Work and Dress Making, Clothing and Textile, Food and Nutrition, Hotel Management and Catering.

 

GROUP B:

Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Health Science, Agricultural Science, Mathematics/Arithmetic Process/Basic Mathematics, Economics, Physical and Health Education.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Home Economics, Economics and Mathematics.
